League and UEFA Europa League, but not UEFA Super Cup) for more than one

been fielded in the first, second, third qualifying round or the play-offs of the

Champions League or UEFA Europa League for another club as from the group

Emre Mor asked to leave Borussia Dortmund for Celta Vigo, the club’s sporting director Michael Zorc has confirmed.
The club insist Mor requested a transfer because he hopes for another club with “greater opportunities” after failing to make an impact with the Bundesliga giants.
“We respect this wish and wish Emre all the best for the future,” sport director Zorc told the club’s official website.

BREAKING NEWS

We understand Borussia Dortmund have agreed a deal with Manchester City for their highly rated teenager Jadon Sancho.

The England U17 winger, who is coveted by a host of leading clubs, had failed to turn up for numerous training sessions at City after being left out of Pep Guardiola’s first team squad.

We understand the deal is a loan which could become permanent.

The England U17 winger, who is coveted by a host of leading clubs, had failed to turn up for numerous training sessions at City after being left out of Pep Guardiola’s first team squad.

We understand the deal is a loan which could become permanent.
